body:
Usually carved from the heartwood of an ancient oak, ash, sequoia, or other large tree, this staff allows use of the following spells:

  • Dispel magic (1 charge)
  • Resist energy (1 charge)
  • Shield (1 charge)
  • Dismissal (2 charges)
  • Lesser globe of invulnerability (2 charges)
  • Repulsion (3 charges)
name: Staff of Abjuration
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Rings/Rods and Staves/Staves/Staff of Abjuration
